Uses of Class
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem.GroundItem

Packages that use GroundItem 
Package Description
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects  
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem  
gameWorld.rooms  
libraries.addedByUs  

  • Uses of GroundItem in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects

    Methods in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects that return GroundItem 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    GroundItem Hero.addInventory​(Item item)
    Adds an item into the Hero inventory, if the Item as the name "money", "key" or "bomb" then it will be added in the hero variable of the same name.
    GroundItem Hero.dropInventory​(int slot)
    Drops the Item linked to the slot if it exists.

  • Uses of GroundItem in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem

    Subclasses of GroundItem in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Bomb
    A Bomb is a GroundItem, but with some special abilities.
    class  Chest
    A Chest is a GroundItem, but with some special abilities.
    class  Key
    A Key is a GroundItem, but with some special abilities.
    class  LifeItem
    A LifeItem is a GroundItem, it uses different variables such as a boolean half which specifies whether the heart is full or not.
    class  Money
    Money is a GroundItem, it uses different variables such as an integer value to indicate the amount of money the hero will be getting by colliding with it.

  • Uses of GroundItem in gameWorld.rooms

    Methods in gameWorld.rooms that return types with arguments of type GroundItem 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<GroundItem> Room.getListGroundItem()
    Returns the list of GroundItem of the Room.
    Methods in gameWorld.rooms with parameters of type GroundItem 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Room.addListGroundItem​(GroundItem groundItem)
    Adds a groundItem to the List of GroundItem in the Room.
    Method parameters in gameWorld.rooms with type arguments of type GroundItem 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Room.setListGroundItem​(java.util.ArrayList<GroundItem> lGroundItem)
    Sets the list of GroundItem of the Room to a new one.

  • Uses of GroundItem in libraries.addedByUs

    Returns a random Rare GroundItem.
